TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DiscoveryDocument extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a discovery document. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks XML Web services discovery involves discovering the available XML Web services, given an URL. The URL typically points to a discovery document, which usually has a.disco file name extension. The discovery document, which is an XML document, contains references to information about the existance of XML Web services, such as a service description, XML Schema Definition (XSD) language schema, or another discovery document. This class represents the contents of the discovery document; where the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.References%2A> property contains a list of the references contained within the discovery document.
## Examples The following code example reads a discovery document from a file using the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.Read%2A> and writes it back out to file using the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.Write%2A> method.
[!code-cs[DiscoveryDocument#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.services.di_7_1.cs)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryDocument#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.services.di_7_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[DiscoveryDocument#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.web.services.di_7_1.cpp)]

Docs.summary: Namespace of the discovery XML element of a discovery document.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A discovery document contains references to documents describing Web Services. These references are XML elements contained within a discovery XML element. That discovery XML element is a member of the XML namespace specified by the Namespace constant.
## Examples The following code example displays the XML namespace associated with the discovery XML element of a discovery document.
[!code-cs[DiscoveryDocument_DiscoveryDocument#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/f-system.web.services.di_0_1.cs)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryDocument_DiscoveryDocument#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/f-system.web.services.di_0_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[DiscoveryDocument_DiscoveryDocument#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/f-system.web.services.di_0_1.cpp)]

Docs.summary: A list of references contained within the discovery document.
Docs.value: An containing the references within the discovery document.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A discovery document contains references to information about the existence of XML Web services. These references can refer to service descriptions, XSD schemas, or other discovery documents. The References property contains a list of these references.
## Examples The following code example enumerates over the references for a discovery document.
[!code-cs[DiscoveryDocument_DiscoveryDocument#5](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.web.services.di_25_1.cs)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryDocument_DiscoveryDocument#5](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.web.services.di_25_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[DiscoveryDocument_DiscoveryDocument#5](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.web.services.di_25_1.cpp)]
